contiene cualquier tipo de ejemplo ilustrativo.

egXML.p: The term element is declared using the following syntax: <![CDATA[<!ELEMENT term (%phrase.content;)>]]

remarks.p: If the example contains material in XML markup, either it must be enclosed within a CDATA marked section, or character entity references must be used to represent the markup delimiters. If the example contains well-formed XML, it should be marked using the more specific egXML element.
